content: at start of round round 3 slip_stitch into next st chain 1 * single_crochet 4x into next chain space repeat from * all the way around in each chain space slip_stitch to join 1st and last single_crochet together round 4 chain 2 counts as part of a 3 double_crochet cluster 2 double_crochet cluster into 1st st chain 2 skip next st * 3 double_crochet cluster into next st chain 2 skip next st repeat from * all around slip_stitch into space between chain 2 and 2 double_crochet cluster at start of round round 5 slip_stitch into next st chain 1 * single_crochet 4x into next chain space repeat from * all the way around in each chain space slip_stitch to join 1st and last single_crochet together fasten_off and weave in ends crochet pattern | firstthecoffee com crochet pattern | firstthecoffee com
